to all devices listed below

Send Wake-On-LAN
To ALL Computers Listed Below

database file was not there. now a new database file created.
In this database you will be able to save a list of MAC addresses to wake them up
Failed to send Wake-on-LAN packets. Please check your connection, be it WiFi or cable.
please fill both the computer name and the mac address

Error! The input is not a MAC address.
MAC address format is similar to either 3D:F2:C9:A6:B3:4F OR 3D-F2-C9-A6-B3-4F
